<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2oa

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.51

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Activates thermal vision. Mode index defines what sort of thermal vision it is:<br>
* 0 - White Hot
* 1 - Black Hot
* 2 - Light Green Hot / Darker Green cold
* 3 - Black Hot / Darker Green cold
* 4 - Light Red Hot /Darker Red Cold
* 5 - Black Hot / Darker Red Cold
* 6 - White Hot . Darker Red Cold
* 7 - Thermal (Shade of Red and Green, Bodies are white) <br>
This command only works with [[camCreate]] created camera that is currently the main camera for the player (see example).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> Bool '''setCamUseTI''' modeIndex

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> Bool: [[Boolean]] - enable/disable the effect

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> modeIndex: [[Number]] - Ti mode

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[true]] [[setCamUseTI]] 1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> "Predator" vision:<code>_cam = "camera" [[camCreate]] [0,0,0];
_cam [[camSetTarget]] [[player]];
_cam [[camSetRelPos]] [0,1,1.5];
_cam [[cameraEffect]] ["Internal","Back"];
_cam [[camCommit]] 0;
[[true]] [[setCamUseTI]] 7;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[camUseNVG]], [[disableTIEquipment]]
</value></part></template>
